description: This course provides an opportunity for students to gain experience in a research laboratory in the School of Psychology. Students will participate in the day to day running of a research laboratory, which may involve attending lab meetings, assisting with conducting research, and conducting literature searches (five hours per week). Enrolment is by permission only. Please consult the list of potential supervisors at  prior to seeking the agreement of an academic to supervise you. You must then contact the Deputy Head of School (Teaching and Learning) indicating which academic has agreed to supervise your research experience and seek permission to enrol.
